name: Picasa Web Albums - Dark
description: I haven't seen anything for Picasa yet, so since i found the great XRAY applet, I made my first style from scratch.. just a rough beginning, but working.  There may be some unneeded code in there, I kind of worked backward on this.  I'm gonna make a new Picasa graphic eventually, but for now this is doing what i want.  Not much but a start. Enjoy
